text: UNetbootin (Universal Netboot Installer) is a cross-platform utility that can create Linux Live USB drives and can load a variety of system utilities or install various Linux distributions and other operating systems without a CD.SourceForge.net, UNetbootin distributions with built-in support; retrieved 2012-6-7. ==Development== UNetbootin is an open-source software project. It has 130,000+ weekly downloads.SourceForge.net, Unetbootin download stats; retrieved 2012-6-7. For Windows, Mac OS X and Linux systems, UNetbootin may make it possible to do without the hard drive.Dörner, Stephan. "So bleibt der PC garantiert virenfrei" (Ensuring the Viruc-free PC), Handelsblatt (Germany). June 4, 2012; excerpt, Für Windows, Mac OS X und Linux gibt es dafür das kostenlose Tool UNetbootin, ... [b]esonderer Vorteil der Live-Distribution: Sie kommt ohne Festplatte aus; retrieved 2012-6-7. ==Packages == UNetbootin is part of many official software package repositories,ArchLinux.org, "Official repositories," excerpt, "A software repository is a storage location from which software packages may be retrieved and installed on a computer"; retrieved 2012-6-7. including Debian,Debian, Package unetbootin; retrieved 2012-6-7. Ubuntu,Unbuntu, Package unetbootin; retrieved 2012-6-7. Fedora,Fedora, Package unetbootin; retrieved 2012-6-7. OpenSUSE,openSUSE, Package unetbootin ; retrieved 2012-6-7. Gentoo Linux,Gentoo, Package unetbootin;retrieved 2012-6-7. and others. ==Related pages== * List of tools to create Live USB systems ==References== ==Further reading== * Biersdorfer, J.D. (2009). "UNetbootin" at NetBooks: The Missing Manual. Sebastopol, California: O'Reilly Media. ; OCLC 435462743 * Ciampa, Mark. (2011). "UNetbootin" at Security+ Guide to Network Security Fundamentals. Boston, Massachusetts: Course Technology. ; OCLC 707969716 == Other websites == *UNetbootin Official Website *UNetbootin Official Wiki *UNetbootin Launchpad Development Page Category:Linux software
title: UNetbootin
